summary: Highly skilled in Quantity Surveying and Project Management with substantial impact in civil construction projects, delivering budget optimization across multiple sectors.

bullets.text: Analyzed comprehensive tendering documents for various projects, including civil construction and real estate developments, ensuring alignment with definitive design specifications.
Utilized First Principle estimating to achieve in-depth cost analysis, resulting in accurate project cost assessments.
Prepared detailed Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and tender documents for multifaceted construction activities, achieving a 97% accuracy rate in cost predictions.
Conducted cost estimating and negotiated with suppliers for MEP installations, achieving cost reductions of up to 18%.
Assessed additional costs driven by design variations, minimizing unexpected expenditures by 12% on existing projects.
Led preparation of final detailed BOQs for large-scale temple complexes, ensuring comprehensive documentation of architectural and structural elements.
Initiated and submitted documentation for project approvals, achieving 100% compliance with regulatory standards.
Conducted in-depth tender analysis for infrastructure projects, identifying potential cost-saving opportunities during the conceptual stage.
Developed preliminary budgets based on draft designs for Tender Opening Committee, reducing discrepancies in budget forecasts by 15%.
Managed the preparation of detailed BOQs encompassing all project components, ensuring comprehensive financial planning and monitoring.
Facilitated cost consulting with a focus on supplier engagements, resulting in consistent project cost alignment.
Proposed alternative construction methodologies to meet budgetary constraints, saving an average of 13% per project.
Coordinated with contractors for scope clarification, maintaining clear communication and delivering projects within budget expectations.
Supported successful award of key infrastructure contracts totaling $30.0M, contributing as a strategic financial advisor.
Reviewed tendering documentation extensively for diverse construction proposals, ensuring precise scope definition and cost alignment.
Prepared comprehensive BOQ and strategic tender proposals, driving successful project bids and securing high-profile contracts.

additionalExperience: Certified by CAU BR and AIQS member since December 2023. Completed Autodesk Revit certifications and specialized courses in construction management.
